response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which we believe is worth more than $1,000,000 to us. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for high-quality products. We are confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
